table.name: civicrm_mailboxmailing_mail_settings
table.comment: Various email accounts for use by Mailboxmailing extension (and its processor)

field.name: id
field.title: Mail Settings ID
field.comment: primary key

field.name: domain_id
field.title: Mail Settings Domain
field.comment: Which Domain is this match entry for

field.name: name
field.title: Mail Settings Name
field.comment: name of this group of settings

field.name: domain
field.title: email Domain
field.comment: email address domain (the part after @)

field.name: localpart
field.title: email Local Part
field.comment: optional local part (like civimail+ for addresses like civimail+s.1.2@example.com)

field.name: return_path
field.title: Return Path
field.comment: contents of the Return-Path header

field.name: protocol
field.title: Protocol
field.comment: name of the protocol to use for polling (like IMAP, POP3 or Maildir)

field.name: server
field.title: Mail Server
field.comment: server to use when polling

field.name: port
field.title: Mail Port
field.comment: port to use when polling

field.name: username
field.title: Mail Account Username
field.comment: username to use when polling

field.name: password
field.title: Mail Account Password
field.comment: password to use when polling

field.name: is_ssl
field.title: Mail Account Uses SSL
field.comment: whether to use SSL or not

field.name: source
field.title: Mail Folder
field.comment: folder to poll from when using IMAP, path to poll from when using Maildir, etc.

field.name: sender_group_id
field.title: Sender Group
field.comment: The group of contacts allowed to send mailings using these MailSettings.

field.name: recipient_group_id
field.title: Recipient Group
field.comment: The group of contacts to receive mailings using these MailSettings.

field.name: subject
field.title: Mailing Subject
field.comment: A pattern to use as the subject for the Mailing.

field.name: from_email_address_id
field.title: From e-mail address
field.comment: Implicit FK to civicrm_option_value.value for from email address to use when sending notifications.

field.name: notify_disallowed_sender
field.title: Notify disallowed sender
field.comment: Whether to notify disallowed sender.

field.name: notify_disallowed_sender_template
field.comment: A Smarty template to use for notifications sent to disallowed senders.

field.name: notify_sender_errors
field.title: Notify sender about errors
field.comment: Whether to notify senders about errors.

field.name: notify_sender_errors_template
field.comment: A Smarty template to use for notifications about errors sent to senders.

field.name: notification_activity_type_id
field.title: Notification Activity Type
field.comment: The activity type to use for activities to notify senders about errors.

field.name: archive_mailing
field.title: Archive Mailing
field.comment: Whether to archive mailings after sending.
